node.longAnswer: The president has waged a monthslong campaign to discredit mail voting across the country. Trump insists -- falsely -- that mail voting is prone to fraud, a claim for which there is no evidence.

node.longAnswer: He tweeted in August that “voting by mail is safe and secure.” Biden and Democrats have encouraged people to got to iwillvote.com, which includes information about voting by mail and connects them with state resources to request a mail ballot.
